fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.data.views

Interface IListViewFilter

  • Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @PluginService
 @FunctionalInterface
public interface IListViewFilter
    Extension point for filtering the default collection of list views provided for a user from a connector.

    Instances of this filter are made available to the IDataViewService via the OSGi service registry. Filters are selected in order of priority, starting with the highest service.ranking property first, followed by the service.id property.

    Thread safety: implementations are required to be safe for concurrent access.

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    REFLEXE Technologies
    See Also:
    IDataViewService.getListViews(fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.auth.ITicket)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<IListView> filterListViews(IUser forUser, IConnector fromConnector, List<IListView> defaultCollection)
      Optionally filters the default collection of list views from a connector, for a specified user.

    • Method Detail

      • filterListViews

        List<IListView> filterListViews(IUser forUser,
                                IConnector fromConnector,
                                List<IListView> defaultCollection)
        Optionally filters the default collection of list views from a connector, for a specified user.
        Parameters:
        forUser - the non-null user that requires a default collection of list views.
        fromConnector - the non-null connector that provided the data sources used to construct the default collection of list views.
        defaultCollection - the non-null (possibly empty) default collection of list views constructed by querying the specified connector.
        Returns:
        a derived collection of list views for the specified connector, or the same collection if no modification is required. If null is returned, then another filter (if any lower-priority filter is available) may be queried; no other filter will be queried if a non-null collection is returned.
        Since:
        1.0
